title: Dinner with Gavin Rossdale
overview: This is more than just a cooking show - it's a backstage pass to a world where food, music, and heartfelt conversation collide. In each episode, the iconic band Bush's frontman Gavin Rossdale designs and prepares a sumptuous four-course meal in his Hollywood Hills home, setting the stage for an unforgettable evening with an A-list guest - Serena Williams, Selma Blair, Tom Jones, Common, Jack McBrayer and Brooke Shields. As they cook, dine, and unwind, these celebrity icons shed their public personas to share raw, unfiltered stories about success, challenges, and the human experience.
